parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain name of the BasePathMapping resource to be described.

parameters.name: basePath
parameters.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name. This value must be unique for all of the mappings across a single API. Specify --(none)' if you do not want callers to specify any base path name after the domain name.

nested_items.name: basePath
nested_items.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name.

nested_items.name: restApiId
nested_items.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

nested_items.name: stage
nested_items.description: The name of the associated stage.
